long_description: If only everyone traveled with a Gusto Inflatable Pillow!-you'd never again have to be woken up to a stranger snoring on your shoulder. Adjustable closure with cordlock provides even support and keeps your head from drooping. Pillow fully inflates with just two breaths; release air with the touch of a button to customize your comfort. Flip the pillow over or swivel it around until you find the position that works for you. Asymmetrical shape creates exceptional comfort for necks both big and small. Micro terry polyester cover is soft and cozy against your skin; cover is removable and machine washable.
short_description: If only everyone traveled with a Gusto Inflatable Pillow!-you'd never again have to be woken up to a stranger snoring on your shoulder.
